Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
JavaWebStore.service.ShoppingCart
public class ShoppingCart extends Object
the class shopping cart represents a shopping cart that empties itself when an order is passed. It's like a temporary list that's added to the order object when the order is passed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ShoppingCart()
    Default constructor that initializes an empty list when the ShoppingCart's instance is created

    • calculateTotalRecursive

      public double calculateTotalRecursive()
      Same method but with a recursive approach
      Returns:
      the total sum of the prices of the products

    • checkout

      public Order checkout(Payment payment, String orderID) throws OnlineStoreException
      Method to make the checkout of the cart that generates an Order object
      Parameters:
      payment - A payment method chose by the user
      orderID - The id of the order
      Returns:
      The Order created with the infos
      Throws:
      OnlineStoreException - the exception occurs when the cart is empty or if the payment fails
